title: President Obama, 60 Minutes, NASA, Church Complaints and more.
itunes:title: President Obama, 60 Minutes, NASA, Church Complaints and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Don't let what's happenin' in this world affect what's happenin' in your heart. God is good!!! The Chief Love Officer has a mature woman who loves nudity but can't accept change up first. Pastor Motown and Deacon Def Jam were talking about Trump, voting and the middle finger in The Jackpot Joint of Jerusalem. Singer Jeremih has been hospitalized because of COVID-19. Tyler Perry is the People's Champ! Junior has a story that takes us back to when he was 10 years old. In Sports Talk, we see how the NFL got the crew divided. 44 was interviewed on 60 Minutes and offered some advice to 45. Victor Glover makes history and is to become the first Black astronaut on I.S.S. for an extended period of time. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about the vote in Georgia and reminds us to keep the faith.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Don't let what's happenin' in this world affect what's happenin' in your heart. God is good!!! The Chief Love Officer has a mature woman who loves nudity but can't accept change up first. Pastor Motown and Deacon Def Jam were talking about Trump, voting and the middle finger in The Jackpot Joint of Jerusalem. Singer Jeremih has been hospitalized because of COVID-19. Tyler Perry is the People's Champ! Junior has a story that takes us back to when he was 10 years old. In Sports Talk, we see how the NFL got the crew divided. 44 was interviewed on 60 Minutes and offered some advice to 45. Victor Glover makes history and is to become the first Black astronaut on I.S.S. for an extended period of time. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about the vote in Georgia and reminds us to keep the faith.
